name: Cycling Manager (itch)
description:
This game is a suprisingly addicting Cycling Manager.

If you want to play a manager game without endless micro-management, just with the core elements to

  • sign up riders for the different races
  • set up basic tactics
  • watch results
  • preplan your season
  • hire and dismiss riders
  • watch statistics

Then you might try out this Cycling Manager.

At the start you choose from 25 Teams, which are ordered by general strength. You can examine all riders from every team before you sign up. Do you want to play with a team that is already very strong? With a midfield team? Or with a team from the bottom of that list and fight your way up to the top? It's you choice!

Few tips and tricks:

Endurance is crucial. When Energy is at 100, then Endurance doesn't matter. But the higher the Energy loss, the more Endurance kicks in. Therefore you Energy planning is quite important. The different driving styles which you set up in the tactics, cost different amount of energy per race.

Breakaways are only for gathering mountain and sprint points. Currently not for winning races.

Savegame:

At the moment there is only one savegame supported. But if you want to play more than one career with a different team for example, that is no problem. Just go into the Folder 'CM_Data' and rename the File 'CM_Data.cus' to something different. When you now start the game again, it's creating a new savegame :)

Available in english and german.
